overview: Apex International is one of the leading manufacturers and exporters of ladies fashion scarves and ladies fashion stoles. Besides this, we also export handicrafts and soft stone products. Established in 1991, we are one of the fastest growing organisations catering to the diverse needs of the clients across the globe. Today, we have carved a niche for ourselves in the global market. Our endeavour is to continually enhance the quality of products and services as well.
